    1. FinalizableWeakReference(T, FinalizableReferenceQueue)

Class FinalizableWeakReference<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.ref.Reference<T>
java.lang.ref.WeakReference<T>
com.google.common.base.FinalizableWeakReference<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
FinalizableReference
@GwtIncompatible public abstract class FinalizableWeakReference<T> extends WeakReference<T> implements FinalizableReference
Weak reference with a finalizeReferent() method which a background thread invokes after the garbage collector reclaims the referent. This is a simpler alternative to using a ReferenceQueue.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Bob Lee
